content: https://zealy.io/c/adonxofficial/questboardTelegram: https://t.me/adonx_oneWebsite: [Adonx]http://adonx.one/Twitter: [Adonx Official]http://twitter.com/adonx_officialDiscord: [Adonx Discord]http://discord.gg/FryZMcgxa8Claim 3,000,000 ADONX Tokens in Our Exclusive Airdrop EventRead on to discover how you can join the ranks of ADONX supporters and buyers in earning rewards.For Supporters:Are you passionate about ADONX and want to be part of its success story? By supporting the ADONX Token Sale, you not only contribute to the project's growth but also earn exciting rewards. Join our official Zealy Community and embark on a quest that will lead you to your well-deserved share of ADONX tokens.For Buyers:We value our buyers and want to show our appreciation for your contribution. As a special thank you, we've designed a unique experience just for you. Through a step-by-step process, buyers can accumulate XP and claim the quest in three manageable stages. Alternatively, if you prefer a swift approach, you can complete all steps in a single transaction and instantly claim all the rewards. To claim the quest you must buy ADONX from your Zealy wallet account.Step 1: Purchase 500 ADONX > Claim 500 XPStep 2: Purchase an additional 500 ADONX > Claim 500 XPStep 3: Purchase yet another 500 ADONX > Claim 500 XPAirdrop Distribution:The distribution of 3,000,000 ADONX Tokens will be based on the XP earned by our dedicated Zealy participants. Rest assured, once the sale phase concludes, we will swiftly drop the tokens into your registered Zealy wallet address. Be ready to witness the results of your support and participation.Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity. Join us in the ADONX journey, support the Token Sale, and claim your rightful rewards. Keep an eye on your Zealy account for updates on the Airdrop distribution.Disclaimer: Please ensure you follow all guidelines and terms specified for participation in the ADONX Airdrop event. Participation is subject to compliance with our policies and regulations.
